item.description: I just got back. Looks like this could be a waterski day.Â  We will decide where to ski based on who is going and the weather, like Lake Cochiutate, Chebaco Lake in Hamilton, or some flat water near Boston Harbor. We will depart from my place and then if others will meet at the ramp, we will pick a meet time at the chosen ramp. Share of Gas, etc should be $25.00
item.how_to_find_us: I will be here or call my mobile. 6 1 7 6 3 3 6 1 8 7 Call if you are considering going or are on your way.
item.name: Today - Saturday PM Waterski
